content:
Ord. No. 20230831-142, Pt. 23, effective September 1, 2023, repealed the former § 30-2-62, and enacted
a new § 30-2-62 as set out herein. The former § 30-2-62 pertained to expiration of
approved preliminary plan and derived from City Code Section 25-4-62 and City/County
subdivision agreement; Ord. 031211-11; Ord. 031211-42; Ord. 20120524-130.

An application for approval of a plat may include all or a portion of the land included
in an approved preliminary plan.

Source: City Code Section 25-4-81; Ord. 031211-11; Ord. 031211-42.
